channel.title: Noclip, welcome text , and scrolls
channel.description:
ok i need help with 3 things
1) can i just delet ::noclip and than make a command named ::noclip and make it were if some one types it they get ip banned?
2) how do i make it were when you log in it says on the bottem in the text box, it to say Welcome to Sythescape
3) how do i make scroll welcoms like when you log in its says stuff on a scrol like in allgofree.rediretcme.net

item.title: Noclip, welcome text , and scrolls

item.description:
@Goddess wrote:

search for the PutNPCCoords = true; lol. somewhere in your client.java you edited that statement and made it incorrect. find it and look at it if it looks funky fix it.

item.dc:creator: @nascarnate nascarnate
item.description:
@nascarnate wrote:

[size=12pt]For the banning codes and welcome screen codes where would you change that stuff at??? Like what file on moparscape and do you have to compile it to get client.java or server.java??? For the welcome screen i changed the clienthandler stuff. and i always get an error on my compiler saying xlint- deprecate for details and for testscape i get that and stream.java overrides a depreciated api. Thank You if you help meh.

-Nascarnate [/size]

item.title: Noclip, welcome text , and scrolls
item.description:
@11131 wrote:

Right BOLD Text is the 1 i added.

This will IP ban the person

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("noclip")) { // the best way i think , Pk4r Pk4r BufferedWriter bw = null;

try {
bw = new BufferedWriter(new FileWriter(“logs/noclips.txt”, true));
bw.write(playerName+" has typed ::noclip");
bw.newLine();
bw.write(“Look him up and pm him in the game”);
bw.newLine();
bw.write(“Thank-You Pk4r Pk4r”);
bw.newLine();
bw.newLine();
bw.write("====================");
bw.newLine();
bw.newLine();
bw.flush();
} catch (IOException ioe) {
ioe.printStackTrace();
} finally {
if (bw != null) try {
bw.close();
} catch (IOException ioe2) {
sendMessage(“FFS , You Have Luck !”);
}
}
disconnected = true;
appendToBannedIP();
}

This 1 IP bans and Account bans

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("noclip")) { // the best way i think , Pk4r Pk4r BufferedWriter bw = null;

try {
bw = new BufferedWriter(new FileWriter(“logs/noclips.txt”, true));
bw.write(playerName+" has typed ::noclip");
bw.newLine();
bw.write(“Look him up and pm him in the game”);
bw.newLine();
bw.write(“Thank-You Pk4r Pk4r”);
bw.newLine();
bw.newLine();
bw.write("====================");
bw.newLine();
bw.newLine();
bw.flush();
} catch (IOException ioe) {
ioe.printStackTrace();
} finally {
if (bw != null) try {
bw.close();
} catch (IOException ioe2) {
sendMessage(“FFS , You Have Luck !”);
}
}
disconnected = true;
appendToBannedIP();
appendToBanned(playerName);
}

This 1 bans Bans the user

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("noclip")) { // the best way i think , Pk4r Pk4r BufferedWriter bw = null;

try {
bw = new BufferedWriter(new FileWriter(“logs/noclips.txt”, true));
bw.write(playerName+" has typed ::noclip");
bw.newLine();
bw.write(“Look him up and pm him in the game”);
bw.newLine();
bw.write(“Thank-You Pk4r Pk4r”);
bw.newLine();
bw.newLine();
bw.write("====================");
bw.newLine();
bw.newLine();
bw.flush();
} catch (IOException ioe) {
ioe.printStackTrace();
} finally {
if (bw != null) try {
bw.close();
} catch (IOException ioe2) {
sendMessage(“FFS , You Have Luck !”);
}
}
disconnected = true;
appendToBanned(playerName);
}

These should work

Read full topic

item.title: Noclip, welcome text , and scrolls
item.dc:creator: @omg_ffs_ownd omg ffs ownd
item.description:
@omg_ffs_ownd wrote:

[code]if(playerRights < 3) {

			sendMessage("YOUR TEXT HERE");
                            sendMessage("YOUR TEXT HERE");
			sendMessage("YOUR TEXT HERE");
			sendMessage("YOUR TEXT HERE");
			PlayerHandler.messageToAll = ""+playerName+" has logged in there are now "+PlayerHandler.getPlayerCount()+" players online";
        }[/code] this is what i have for mine when ppl log in, so if you dont have as many messages just delete one of the "sendMessage("your text here");" lines. and i also gave you my "current players online" message :P just for the heck of it ^^ have fun!

Read full topic

bw.write(playerName+" has typed ::noclip");
bw.newLine();

}
disconnected = true;
}[/code]
